name: JubiLite (Michael Anderson)
description:
JubiLite is a Neon Rhythm Survival Game.

Use WASD or Arrow keys to traverse the grid-like arena and dodge enemies.

ESC Key to pull up the menu.

You can set the tempo of the game! The faster you go, the more points you'll earn. But be warned, enemies move at the same pace as you. Move at a consistent pace and rack up a combo for bonus points!

If you have any feedback you would like to give, let us know here: https://forms.gle/NGNpaQ3PCmMcKyHx6

This game was made for Score Space Game Jam #10

We placed 1st
